article: customers at kalin , a rustic , ###-year-old tavern , can eat roast pork dinners here in slovenia , step a few yards across the room to croatia to use the bathroom , saunter back to slovenia to pay the bill and end their meal on croatian soil over a game of billiards and a shot of local pear brandy .
